title: League of legends launcher sucks ass
body: This is the shittiest launcher i have ever used. it crashes at least 3 times a day causing me to dodge games unwillingly. This is not due to the speed of my PC because i have a PC faster than 93% of other PC's in the world. Fix your god damn launcher!

replies.body: I'd like to help you out, but I'll need a bit more information on what exactly happens when your client crashes and what error messages you're seeing. With that info I'll be able to provide some steps to take in order to solve this. Thanks!

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=aEsN18El,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-25T22:03:36.016+0000)
>
> I'd like to help you out, but I'll need a bit more information on what exactly happens when your client crashes and what error messages you're seeing. With that info I'll be able to provide some steps to take in order to solve this. Thanks!

Whenever i get into champ select the client will bug out visually but not functionally. I cant see my summoner spells, runes, masteries, the champions that anyone is selecting and i can very rarely ban. After this happens the client will crash and stop responding forcing me to restart the client and wait 5 minutes. Yes, i've tried repairing it. It's a completely useless feature.

It sounds like your client is unable to keep a stable connection to the servers, which is why you're having issues seeing content and actions in champ select. There are a number of causes for this, but our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) will go through the most likely solutions for this.

If you still see issues after trying the solutions in that guide, let me know.
